title: getAge method on Person object - determine result

content.question: What, if anything, is printed as a result of executing each of the code segments?

choices.label: Code segment 1 prints  16,  but code segment 2 prints nothing because it will not compile.
Code segment 2 prints  16,  but code segment 1 prints nothing because it will not compile.
Neither code segment will print anything because they will not compile.

content.answer: Code segment 1 prints  16,  but code segment 2 prints nothing because it will not compile.

skill.text: 3.C: Determine the result or output based on code that contains procedural abstractions.
